meta.description: Connect with us at http://www.ihealthtube.com/content/newsletter Neil Miller has poured over plenty of research when it comes to vaccines. In this video, he discusses what he's learned when it comes to a possible connection between vaccine schedules and infant mortality rates in different countries. Think the US is leading the way in the health of its infants? Think again, and watch this!

title: Are Vaccines Really Helping Infants? Watch This and Decide
cleaned_text:
Connect with us at http://www.ihealthtube.com/content/newsletter

Neil Miller has poured over plenty of research when it comes to vaccines. In this video, he discusses what he's learned when it comes to a possible connection between vaccine schedules and infant mortality rates in different countries. Think the US is leading the way in the health of its infants? Think again, and watch this!
